# include <stdio.h>
# include <string.h>

char mat[102][102];

int rows[102];
int cols[102];

int main()
{
	int row, col, i, j, count, bomRow, bomCol, turn=1;
	int out[102][102];
	char str[150];
	char *ptr;
	count=1;
	
	scanf("%d %d", &row, &col);
	
	while(row!=0 && col!=0)
	{
		for(i=1;i<=row;i++)
		{
			scanf("%s", str);
			ptr = str;
			j=1;
			while(*ptr)
			{
				mat[i][j]=*ptr;
				
				if(*ptr== '*')
				{
					rows[count]=i;
					cols[count]=j;
					count++;
					out[i][j]=-1;
				}
				else
				{
				mat[i][j]='0';
				out[i][j]=0;
				}
				
				
				j++;
				ptr++;
			}
		}
		
		
		
		
		for(i=1;i<count;i++)
		{
			bomRow = rows[i];
			bomCol = cols[i];
			
			if( ((bomRow-1)>0) && ((bomCol-1)>0) && (mat[bomRow-1][bomCol-1]!='*'))
			out[bomRow-1][bomCol-1]++;
			
			if( ((bomRow-1)>0) && (mat[bomRow-1][bomCol]!='*'))
			out[bomRow-1][bomCol]++;
			
			if( ((bomRow-1)>0) && ((bomCol+1) <= col) && (mat[bomRow-1][bomCol+1]!='*'))
			out[bomRow-1][bomCol+1]++;
			
			if((bomCol-1)>0 && (mat[bomRow][bomCol-1]!='*'))
			out[bomRow][bomCol-1]++;
			
			if((bomCol+1) <= col && (mat[bomRow][bomCol+1]!='*'))
			out[bomRow][bomCol+1]++;
			
			if( ((bomRow+1) <= row) && ((bomCol-1) > 0) && (mat[bomRow+1][bomCol-1]!='*'))
			out[bomRow+1][bomCol-1]++;
			
			if( (bomRow+1) <=row && (mat[bomRow+1][bomCol]!='*'))
			out[bomRow+1][bomCol]++;
			
			if( ((bomRow+1) <=row) && ((bomCol+1) <=col) && (mat[bomRow+1][bomCol+1]!='*'))
			out[bomRow+1][bomCol+1]++;
		}
		
		if(turn==1)
			printf("Field #1:\n");
		else
			printf("\nField #%d:\n", turn);
		for(i=1;i<=row;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=col;j++)
			{
				if(mat[i][j]=='*')
				printf("%c",mat[i][j]);
				else
				printf("%d", out[i][j]);
			}
			printf("\n");
		}
		
		scanf("%d %d", &row, &col);
		count=1;
		turn++;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
